divs: sighting detailson october 4th 2013 i, again sighted an unknown object above my house in the village of oak creek at approximately 06:00am. this time the craft was boomerang shaped with short light trails off opposite sides which suggest the craft was moving up and down while hovering. i was only able to get two photos of the object. therefore, from now on since i am seeing more and more of these objects on a daily basis i will try to film them on my digital 8 sony w\ 700 zoom lens at power x20. the reason being is that on two of the last three occasions i have taken photos of the three different craft with my droid cell phone and am unable to down load the photos onto my computer or this computer report.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Sedona
There was one other sighting in Sedona on or around October 4th 2013
Summary: I don't know why I am able to see so many UFO's lately but its happening again in the VOC of Sedona AZ
